title: Miami coach discusses matchup against WMU
text:
Miami coach discusses matchup against WMU 
Updated: Mon, Oct 19 2015, 02:47 PM 
OXFORD, Ohio (WKRC) -- Miami football coach Chuck Martin discusses the loss to Northern Illinois and previews this Saturday's game against Western Michigan in the video. The teams will meet at 2 p.m. in Kalamazoo. Miami has dropped six straight games. Video courtesy Miami University Athletics Related Stories
